quote: If I can survive in 2007 and 2008 going forward in real estate, I am going to be positioned perfectly to survive when times are good.
why_clipworthy: This quote encapsulates a powerful mindset for thriving in challenging markets.
suggested_hook: How to turn a market downturn into your greatest opportunity.

quote: If you think about something, call them. I pick up that phone and I make that call.
why_clipworthy: This advice is a simple yet effective tactic for maintaining client relationships.
suggested_hook: The simplest way to stay top of mind with your clients.
